Eenvoudiger structeren Naarmate Google is gegroeid, is het managen van het bedrijf ingewikkelder geworden. Afgelopen kerst hebben we besloten dat dit het beste moment is om structurele veranderingen aan te brengen. `` De afgelopen 10 jaar hebben we allemaal een rol gehad bij het nemen van besluiten. Bradley Graham calls the book's tone`` characteristically tough and defiant'' as Donald Rumsfeld also criticizes Bush's shortcomings in resolving issues among senior advisers. Still, his barbs stop short of ad hominem attacks, and the memoir, even with its flashes of lingering resentment, maintains a measured tone. Wishes Bush Had Let Him Go Earlier In the book, Donald Rumsfeld explains that on two separate occasions after the story of Iraqi detainee abuse at Abu Ghraib broke out, he offered his resignation to the president.
